Hi eavryone I was hoping that someone could help me undertand how to fix the issue of “stale CANcoders” as well. There seems to be things wrong with using getPosition (). How should I go about fixing this? We updated the GitHub we posted above. We use CTRE cancoders.

It is probably a Phoenix 5 6/pro version mix up. Check what version you are using in your code and reflash firmware accordingly.

It looks like you are using Phoenix 5 so reflash to v5 in Phoenix Tuner

When we built an offseason robot last year we had all kinds of CAN problems. One of the issues was we didn’t cut our wires because we knew the robot was temporary. After shortening the wire runs most of our CAN problems disappeared. Moral of the story - start with the wiring then check the programming.
